name: Mark's Arcade: Pacfruit
description:
Mark's Arcade: Pacfruit

----------------------------

Made in 5 days for MarkJam #5!

----------------------------

Instructions: 

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Try to get as many apples and pineapples as you can!

----------------------------

TIPS:

  • Try to look for a pattern in the ghosts movement!
  • Eat the pineapples for extra health

----------------------------

Please make sure to tell me your scores in the comments section below!

Hope you enjoy! 👍
